plants.name: Echinocereus Cactus
plants.subtitle: A Majestic Addition to Your Plant Collection
label: indoor
cactus
features: Species: Echinocereus spp.
Mature Size: Varies by species, typically ranging from 4 to 12 inches (10-30 cm) in height.
Blooming Season: Typically spring or summer, with flowers lasting several days to weeks.
Pot Size: Available in various pot sizes to suit your preference and needs.
Shipping: Our Echinocereus Cacti are carefully packaged and shipped with the utmost care to ensure they arrive in excellent condition.
plants.description: Ladyfinger cactus (Echinocereus pentalophus) is also known as Alice, Devil's Fingers, and Dog Tail. It needs bright sunlight, light fertilizer, and is prone to root rot. The root system is shallow and weak. Aphids and mealybugs are also a danger. Avoiding wet soil can help with success with a ladyfinger cactus.

plants.name: Golden Barrel Cactus
plants.subtitle: A Striking Focal Point for Your Home
label: Indoor
cactus
features: Species: Echinocactus grusonii
Mature Size: Up to 3 feet (90 cm) in height and diameter.
Blooming Season: Late spring to early summer.
Pot Size: Available in 6-inch, 8-inch, and 10-inch pots.
Shipping: Carefully packaged and shipped to ensure safe arrival.
plants.description: The Golden Barrel Cactus is a stunning addition to any collection. It thrives in bright sunlight and requires minimal water. Beware of overwatering to avoid root rot.

plants.name: Christmas Cactus
plants.subtitle: A Festive and Easy-to-Care-For Plant
label: Indoor
succulent
features: Species: Schlumbergera bridgesii
Mature Size: Up to 12 inches (30 cm) in height and width.
Blooming Season: Typically blooms in winter, around Christmas.
Pot Size: Available in 4-inch and 6-inch pots.
Shipping: Shipped with care to ensure plants arrive healthy.
plants.description: The Christmas Cactus blooms with vibrant flowers in the winter. It prefers indirect sunlight and regular watering but is prone to root rot if overwatered.

cactus

Pot Size: Available in 6-inch, 8-inch, and 10-inch pots.
Shipping: Securely packaged to ensure safe delivery.
plants.description: The Hedgehog Cactus is known for its beautiful pink flowers. It requires full sun and well-drained soil to thrive.
